When <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho">MachO</a> binaries include a LC&#95;CODE&#95;SIGNATURE load command, the &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT data segment will include a section corresponding to the LC&#95;CODE&#95;SIGNATURE load command. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When MachO binaries include a LC&#95;CODE&#95;SIGNATURE load command,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT data segment will include a section corresponding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to the LC&#95;CODE&#95;SIGNATURE load command. This section serves as a signature</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for the binary. Included in the CodeSignature section is a header followed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// by a hash of the binary. If present, the CodeSignature section is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// last component of the binary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo">CodeSignatureInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: These values are to be kept in sync with those in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LLD&#39;s CodeSignatureSection class.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#ad84cf828b8929e0e5153fae17a811120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#ad84cf828b8929e0e5153fae17a811120">Align</a> = 16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a9c456663a07072ea85e2b3701e7b7da9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a9c456663a07072ea85e2b3701e7b7da9">BlockSizeShift</a> = 12;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The binary is read in blocks of the following size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#aad9de9462872a4bb9da35f5138a7791e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#aad9de9462872a4bb9da35f5138a7791e">BlockSize</a> = (1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a9c456663a07072ea85e2b3701e7b7da9">BlockSizeShift</a>); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 4 KiB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each block, a SHA256 hash (256 bits, 32 bytes) is written to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the CodeSignature section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a3096032b4cc122d4d7e1608b3eadd125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a3096032b4cc122d4d7e1608b3eadd125">HashSize</a> = 256 / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a2d2ff3cc99198e0a89a3f420227d5034"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a2d2ff3cc99198e0a89a3f420227d5034">BlobHeadersSize</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">llvm::alignTo&lt;8&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/macho/cs-superblob">llvm::MachO::CS&#95;SuperBlob</a>) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/macho/cs-blobindex">llvm::MachO::CS&#95;BlobIndex</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The size of the entire header depends upon the filename the binary is being</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// written to, but the rest of the header is fixed in size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a4d4e17cf611e67b925ad9450170fb4d5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a4d4e17cf611e67b925ad9450170fb4d5">FixedHeadersSize</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
